[Recipient.CheckImperialGrantTitleText1], increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§! and lowering your threat by §G$INFAMY$%§!.
Appoint this character to govern a part of our realm
Appoint this character to govern a part of our realm. This will significantly improve their opinion of you.
Grant a landed title to the character
Grant one of your landed titles to another character. This will significantly improve their opinion of you.

Attempt to dismiss §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! from all held titles and offices. \nThis will lower [This.GetHerHis] opinion §R-60§! and the opinion of other members of [This.GetHerHis] dynasty by §R-15§!. \nIf [This.GetSheHe] chooses to refuse, [This.GetSheHe] might try to negotiate or rebel.

To my loyal subject,\nI am afraid I must ask you to lay down command of the [PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. [PrimaryTitle.Heir.GetBestName] has been chosen as your successor and will rule the My councillors will determine who in the [From.PrimaryTitle
